name: Cisco | IOS | Network | Link | Link Flap Error Detected (SYSLOG)
description: %PM-4-ERR_DISABLE: link-flap error detected on Te1/6, putting Te1/6 in err-disable state
event_class__name: Network | Link | Link Flap Error Detected

patterns.value_re: %PM-4-ERR_DISABLE: link-flap error detected on (?P<interface>\S+), putting \S+ in err-disable state
